annotations.kubernetes.io/description: Contains a CA bundle that can be used to verify the kube-apiserver when using internal endpoints such as the internal service IP or kubernetes.default.svc. No other usage is guaranteed across distributions of Kubernetes clusters.

conditions.message: failed to reconcile SSL.Please create your TLS secret test-cluster-ssl and ACTOKEY manually or setup cert-manager correctly: create ssl internally: create TLS internal secret: Secret "ACTOKEY" is invalid: metadata.name: Invalid value: "ACTOKEY": a lowercase RFC 1123 subdomain must consist of lower case alphanumeric characters, '-' or '.', and must start and end with an alphanumeric character (e.g. 'example.com', regex used for validation is '[a-z0-9]([-a-z0-9]*[a-z0-9])?(\.[a-z0-9]([-a-z0-9]*[a-z0-9])?)*')
